abstract: Baltimore contends Wells Fargo steered blacks into high-interest subprime mortgages and caused damage to poor neighborhoods.
snippet: Baltimore contends Wells Fargo steered blacks into high-interest subprime mortgages and caused damage to poor neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge this week tossed out a lawsuit by Baltimore against Wells Fargo, ruling that the city could not prove that the bank’s lending practices had resulted in broad damage to poor neighborhoods.

headline.main: Federal Judge Rejects Suit by Baltimore Against Bank
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Rejects Suit By Baltimore Against Bank
